creator: Line2 Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Line2 is your second number that works on your Android phone, tablets, laptops and watches as a full-featured business phone system, designed for mobile professionals, freelancers, and entrepreneurs. Call and message from a separate number on devices you and your team already have, via Wi-Fi or your existing cellular network, with anyone in the U.S. and Canada for only $9.99/month, or with other Line2 users for free.


Line2 is free to download and to use to call and message other Line2 users. Invite others to download Line2 today so you can communicate with them at no additional cost and without any ads. To call and message users outside of Line2, simply upgrade with an in-app purchase.

Experience the ideal phone system for you and your business with a designated number in the area code of your choice. Keep business and personal separate without needing to purchase clunky landline phones or bulky hardware.

POWERFUL FEATURES FOR JUST $9.99/MONTH:
• Use your Line2 number across your smartphone, computers, tablets, and even smartwatches.
• Choose a number in any city in the U.S. or Canada.
• Enjoy picture and group messaging with anyone in the U.S. and Canada.
• Get a rich and virtually unlimited calling experience that includes caller ID for incoming calls, call forwarding, group calling with up to 20 people, number blocking, and much more.
• Enjoy quick and easy setup with no additional hardware required.
• Use over Wi-Fi/3G/4G/LTE and cellular voice so you’re never without service.

Looking for a business solution for your small business that grows with your company and offers advanced features like an auto attendant, toll-free numbers, online faxing, and much more? Learn more on our website.

Questions or comments? We’re here to help, seven days a week: Support or tap Settings → Help from within the app.

Consider Line2 if you’ve looked at: RingCentral, Sideline, 8x8, Google Voice, Skype
descriptionShort: Add a 2nd line to your phone, tablet, or computer. Talk, message, and much more.

creator: Line2 Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Make phone calls using the simplest, most reliable and affordable texting and calling app. Take control of your communication with Line2 – your complete phone system for business professionals and individuals who would like a private second line. Our texting and calling app lets you seamlessly transition from cellular data to WiFi without any quality compromise.

We make professional and personal communication easy with phone features specially designed to help you stay organized and connected with clients, customers, and other important contacts. Keep your personal and business number separate with the text and call app made to make your life more private and balanced.

Create a local or toll-free number to stay connected anytime, anywhere and discover more features made to simplify your communication needs:

SECOND PHONE NUMBER: choose a new vanity number or multiple phone numbers
CALL RECORDING: automatically record all business calls
GROUP CALL: start a conference call or group call with up to 99 callers at once
VOICEMAIL: access voicemails from multiple devices and set up your own voicemail
AUTO-ATTENDANT: set up auto-attendant messages to direct customers and clients to specific calling queues

WiFi calls, SMS and MMS text are just a few taps away with Line2 – designed for individuals, business professionals, and solopreneurs.

Experience private texting and calling with robust features made to simplify your communication channels. Setting up your new phone number is easy with Line2. Simplify and streamline your mobile phone calls and messages today.

LINE2 FEATURES

Multiple Phone Numbers
- Manage your business phone number with Line2’s features that make creating one (or many!) easy.
- Create a vanity number, texting number or second line for all of your communication needs.
- Add multiple virtual business phone numbers to your device and receive or make calls from anywhere.

Local and Toll-free Phone Numbers
- Our phone call app lets you create localized and toll-free phone numbers to help you connect locally.
- Export your existing phone number to Line2 to keep all of your communication in one place.

Unlimited Text and Call
- Cut the cord with expensive cellular data plans and enjoy unlimited texting and calling on Line2.
- Unlimited VoIP call and text across the United States and Canada.
- Get free calls and group messaging between other Line2 calling app users.

Phone Auto-attendant
- Guide your customers to the right calling queues like sales and support using the auto-attendant feature.
- Add phone call on-hold music and pre-recorded call greetings for added personalization.

No Cellular Data Needed
- VoIP call technology lets you make and receive calls and texts from anywhere, at anytime.
- Say goodbye to cellular data expenses and pricey hardware with Line2.

Calling App That Does More
- Access your Line2 voicemail, phone number and contact from your smartphone, tablet or computer.
- Call recording lets you record calls automatically to help you keep track of important conversations.
- Keep your phone line clear and never miss an important call with our call screening feature.
- Call blocking and call screening with just a few simple taps.

Sign up for our Yearly Plan and get 2 months free!
All of our plans have a 30-day Money Back Guarantee if you are not satisfied with our services.
Get unlimited texting and calling with Line2 when you sign up for one of our plans:
- Monthly: $15.99
- Yearly: $164.99 ($13.75 per month)

Questions or comments? We’re here to help, 7 days a week at http://help.line2.com or tap Settings -> Help from within the app.

Note: Your cellular provider may prohibit or restrict VoIP (Voice over Internet Protocol) on their network. It’s your responsibility to check with your cellular provider about their VoIP functionality, and any additional charges it may incur.
